name: Pizza Minute
description:
How much money can you earn from cooking pizzas?

Follow the recipes to earn money and try to make as much pizza as possible in only one minute.

How to play

Select an ingredient on the bottom bar and click on the pizza to add it.

Follow the order on the right side and click the SELL button to finish the pizza.

This game has been created in 3 hours for the Trijam #155.

Only a part of the resources used for the game have been created during the jam. The other resources can be found by following these links.

  • [LPC] Food - https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-food
  • Pixels Pizza - https://opengameart.org/content/pixels-pizza
  • Good Fruits M484 Games - https://opengameart.org/content/good-fruits-m484-games
  • Collegiate FLF from Casady & Greene - https://www.dafont.com
  • Inventory Sound Effects - https://opengameart.org/content/inventory-sound-effects
  • Different steps on wood, stone, leaves, gravel and mud - https://opengameart.org/content/different-steps-on-wood-stone-leaves-gravel-and-...
